00034 inline int CBitManip::GetFirstBitIndex(quint32 bits) const
00035 {
00036        quint16* words = (quint16*)&bits;
00037        quint8* bytes = (quint8*)&bits;
00038        if (words[0] != 0){
00039               if (bytes[0] != 0){
00040                      return int(m_firstBitInByte[bytes[0]]);
00041               }
00042 
00043               return int(m_firstBitInByte[bytes[1]]);
00044        }
00045        else if (words[1] != 0){
00046               if (bytes[2] != 0){
00047                      return int(m_firstBitInByte[bytes[2]]);
00048               }
00049 
00050               return int(m_firstBitInByte[bytes[3]]);
00051        }
00052 
00053        return -1;
00054 }
